metadata.name: GORFY REMEMER
metadata.description:
Episode 2 of the Gorfy ReMemer multi part film.  
Coloboration with @TrystanNFT  
 
The Mystery of Evolution: Scientists have grown a strange creature in a laboratory and don't know what to do with it.

Living things aren't just born from living things. Scientists managed to create a living creature from nonliving elements. These elements spiritualize the intervention of the higher power of cultural evolution WAGMI & GM.

Next, a new evolution must begin. It will be life growing out of a chemical reaction before the eyes of scientists that will penetrate the social consciousness for a constant consonance with the world. And these fantastical visions are slowly becoming a reality.
